name: Introduction to Zoology
description: This course provides an overview of the major divisions of zoology, including the anatomy, physiology, behavior, ecology, and evolution of animals.

name: Introductory Biology
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of biology, including genetics, cell biology, and evolution.

name: Animal Physiology
description: This course examines the physiology of animals, including the study of the structure and function of the anatomy, physiology, and behavior of animals.

name: Animal Behavior
description: This course examines the behavior of animals, including the study of the evolution of behavior, communication, and social interactions of animals.

name: Herpetology
description: This course examines the ecology and evolution of reptiles and amphibians, including the anatomy, physiology, behavior, and ecology of these animals.
